Vayamos por partes. No solo esta al nivel del primer Portal sino que lo supera, tiene mejores factores que el primer juego, mas puzzles, mas objetos para resolverlos como los gels (extraño el cubo de compania [<3] ), mas personajes y el modo coop. Por ahora terminé el modo historia y la pasé muy bien. Actualizaré mi reseña cuando pruebe el modo coop.
great story and gameplay! great it 3-5 times. 10/10 would recommend

One of the best games ever.

One of the best games ever created, and a brilliant sequel that improves on pretty much every aspect of its predecessor. The puzzles of the test chambers are more varied with brand new mechanics offered by light bridges, carrier beams, propulsion gels etc. There is more investment in narrative aspects, and the game has a more fleshed out storyline completed with entertaining characters and brilliant humorous dialogue. The puzzles are challenging enough to give your brain a workout, particularly on the first playthrough. The only weakness of this game is its replayability, as while experiencing the story of the game again might lure you in for another playthrough, the puzzles lose their novelty that is so important in games of this type. All in all, I can recommend this game to players of every type, from casuals to hardcore gamers and lovers of every genre.
Genau wie der erste Teil ein absoluter Hammer ! Eigenständig und süchtigmachend

单人+双人+双人额外全通关   
我从不晕3D的人，这个游戏玩久了还是会头晕。游戏做的非常好，需要动脑。真是佩服游戏关卡的设计者，脑洞真大，很有创意。非常好玩，建议玩1-2个小时休息一下，要不然会吐。另外一点，v社的游戏优化贼好，不会卡顿，丝滑流畅，对低配玩家很友好。很便宜，游戏质量上乘。
